text:
A lot can be learned from Bollywood actors who end up in some really complicated friendships and situations. From moving on and working with their ex-partners to maintaining a cordial relationship with someone you don't share a pleasant past with, there's a lot that happens between the actors.
However, lately, there has been a significant change as people are more accepting and welcoming now.
For instance, even though Katrina and Deepika have a history of unpleasant past, things have become warm between the two actors. Katrina even turned up for Ranveer and Deepika's wedding reception, proving that all's well that end's well.
Ranveer was at a chat show where he was quizzed about the awkwardness that people face when their past meets their present. There were several reports of Anushka and Ranveer and Anushka dating after the release of Band Baaja Baraat but things didn't work out. They parted ways as a couple but they maintained a professional relationship as they came together for Ladies v/s Ricky Bahl and Dil Dhadakne Do.
Ranveer Singh recently made a candid confession at a celebrity talk show. Ranveer said that both Katrina and Anushka attending the reception was really warm and beautiful.

"They weren't there for the sake of it. They were there to wish us well, which was a really lovely gesture."
He added that it did mean a lot to him. He added,
"It was very significant & special for me that Anushka came. It meant a lot to me. It really did," he is said to have confessed on the talk show.
